Package co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProgressUpdatable
    Interface to be implemented to keep track of the progress of long execution methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorConverter
    This static class converts color values from one color space to another.
    CumulativeStatistics
    Utility class to find the first 2 statistics dimensions (mean and standard deviation) using a cumulative representation.
    File
    File wrapper to display only the name of the file in the toString()
    FilesUtility
    This class helps the GUI to open Open and Save dialogs to make the user select a file or a directory.
    Geometry
    This class helps in geometry calculations.
    GroupManager
    Groups objects according to their proximity using statistical techniques.
    ImageUtility
    This class converts between the different object format of images in java used in this application.
    MatrixReader
    This static class reads values from a csv file and load a double matrix with those values.
    Statistics
    This class calculates the statistics from a give list of numbers.
